name: Super Massive Crate Dash
description:
SMCD is a side-scrolling infinte runner with local multiplayer support.

Players jump/flip and fly over obstacles collecting powerups to try and out-race their opponents.

There are currently 4 levels that feature:

Squashable bunnies, flappy bird mechanics, zero gravity jumping and aztec undergrounds.

Can be played with a large group of people on any custom controller/keyboard.

Please let us know what you would like to see in the game, any feedback is much appreciated!
